# Cloud-Telefonanlagen.ch - LLM Documentation

## Project Overview
This website provides key information about cloud telephony solutions for Swiss SMEs provided by InfraOne IT Solutions.

## Core Concepts
- **Hosted PBX**: Replaces traditional hardware PBX with cloud-based software.
- **Providers**: Peoplefone, 3CX, Wildix, Microsoft Teams, Yeastar.
- **Target Audience**: SMEs in Switzerland (Winterthur, Zurich, Thurgau, Schaffhausen).
- **Pricing**: Flexible per-user pricing starting at CHF 20/month.

## Key Pages
- Homepage: https://www.cloud-telefonanlagen.ch/ (Services, Calculator, Benefits)
- Whitepaper: https://www.cloud-telefonanlagen.ch/whitepaper-voip-zukunft (In-depth guide for SMEs)

## Contact
